entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
